headline: Nasdaq (NDAQ) Margin Growth Contrasts with Revenue Decline Narrative in Latest Earnings
summary: Nasdaq (NDAQ) posted a net profit margin of 19.9%, up from last year’s 13.7%, and grew EPS by 69.4% over the last year, outpacing its five-year earnings growth rate of 5% per year. Looking forward, Nasdaq expects its earnings to grow 8.8% annually, but revenue is forecast to shrink by 13.6% per year over the next three years. Better profitability and accelerated earnings growth stand out, while the looming revenue decline and a premium price-to-earnings ratio set the context for investor...
